name: Priority Matrix Project File
summary: Learn about .PMATRIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: A PMATRIX file saves a complete representation of a particular project and can be used as template, a backup file, or a way to share a project and all its contents and formatting.

PMATRIX files categorize priorities using the Eisenhower method. Users choose from one of four priorities for each task: Critical and Immediate, Critial but not Immediate, Not Critical but Immediate, and Uncategorized.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
